vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐντᾰφ-ιασμός, ὁ,
laying out for burial, NT.Mark.14.8, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
preparation for burial, burial
preparation, of a corpse for burial, burial itself, Mk. 14:8; Jn. 12:7*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 屍體安葬的準備工作 #可 14:8;約 12:7|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 尸体安葬的准备工作 #可 14:8;约 12:7|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: sự khâm liệm; sự tẩm liệm. Xem G1779
